20101228150553.000|20101228150553.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO ARE STRANDED AND

20101228150554.000|20101228150559.000|CC1|JOHN?                           
20101228150559.000|20101228150601.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND, CHRIS, WE HAVE
20101228150601.000|20101228150602.000|CC1|NORMAL AND NOT NORMAL TODAY.    
20101228150602.000|20101228150603.000|CC1|YOU CAN SEE THE HIGHWAYS BEHIND 
20101228150603.000|20101228150603.000|CC1|ME.                             
20101228150603.000|20101228150604.000|CC1|THIS IS TRY TRUE NOW GENERALLY  
20101228150604.000|20101228150605.000|CC1|ON THE BIG ROADS, THEY ARE      
20101228150605.000|20101228150605.000|CC1|LITERALLY BONE-DRY.

20101228152222.000|20101228152225.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20101228152225.000|20101228152225.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20101228152225.000|20101228152228.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20101228152228.000|20101228152228.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20101228152228.000|20101228152228.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20101228152228.000|20101228152231.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20101228152231.000|20101228152231.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20101228152231.000|20101228152233.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20101228152233.000|20101228152233.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20101228152233.000|20101228152236.000|CC1|          thioridazine

20101228152245.000|20101228152248.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes.
